mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD_COMMENT (POST_ID, CMT_CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES (#{postId}, #{cmtContent}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD_COMMENT SET CMT_CONTENT = #{cmtContent}, UPDATE_DATE = NOW() WHERE 1 = 1 AND CMT_ID = #{cmtId} LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_BOARD_COMMENT WHERE 1 = 1 AND CMT_ID = #{cmtId} LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT CMT_ID , POST_ID , CMT_CONTENT , WRITER , REG_DATE , UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_BOARD_COMMENT WHERE 1 = 1 AND POST_ID = #{postId} ORDER BY CMT_ID DESC
